name: Local Traders
public_notice: Local Traders suffered an exploit within their Smart Contract. Visit this Twitter post for more information.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
LOCAL TRADERS is a first-of-its-kind multilingual P2P platform providing investment and crypto trading solutions for LATAM countries. 

LocalTraders aims to bring P2P transactions to the LATAM market, which they feel is often shut out of the global crypto market due to language barriers, communication issues, no legal support and inadequate tax solutions. The public sale of LCT aims to create a thriving community to interact and grow with the platform as well as the initial liquidity for trading on the platform.
